name: ShiftVerse (DEMO)
description:
Trapped in a underground laboratory, you find a peculiar device that shifts you between two alternate worlds. You must use this device to make it through the labyrinth and back to safety.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A small demo made by johnCavatelli, Adan's Workshop, and Molicaugusto

Move WASD,  Mouse to look, space to jump.

Q to switch dimensions, E to interact with buttons
